In the political movements of the United States, the term "La Raza" was and continues to be used to create ethnic solidarity in favor of the [[Chicano Movement|Mexican American Civil Rights Movement]], workers rights, and the rights of immigrants. In this sense, La Raza can be seen as a term connoting racism and exclusion. The literal translation of La Raza is 'The Race.'
